channel.title: CVE Feed for shortpixel -- WP SVG Images
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shortpixel -- WP SVG Images

item.title: CVE-2024-5945|2024-08-01T21:25:03.181Z -- shortpixel -- wp%20svg%20images
item.description: The WP SVG Images plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘type’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 4.2 due to insufficient input sanitization. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, who have permissions to upload sanitized files, to bypass SVG sanitization and inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
